> <OLD>
>
> "I feel so mad, I couldnt avoid this happened, I couldnt avoid that
> Nightlight sneak out or Rodimus capture her... I couldt stop this and
> suppostly I'm a guardian, I was created to protect my base and I couldnt...
> I just failed "Said a Windlord almost with anote of dispair

<NEW>

ELDER nodded as some understanding was coming to him as to what was
affecting WINDLORD so much. "My friend." LORD ELDER said, "You have
not failed, at least in regard Nightlight."

Sighing ELDER stepped closer to WINDLORD, "In a way Nightlight is
doing much like I would think you might do. Her mate is taken by dark
forces and her world is coming apart. She has shown a level of
boldness in stepping in to fix it."

Trying to lay a friendly hand on WINDLORD's shoulder ELDER continued,
"How can we protect someone from something like that?" ELDER looked
into WINDLORD's optics, "Would you want someone to try and stop you if
your mate was taken and you had one chance to save them."

LORD ELDER smiled, "Sometimes to protect someone you have to know when
to let go and allow them the freedom to make mistakes and get into
danger, because in the end they need to grow."

(TAG)

- Preston
